name: Engarde (Sandbox Prototype)
description:
Engarde is an online physics-based stick fighting game where you battle it out using the ultimate weapon: a shield. Deflect projectiles, bash against your enemies, and be the last one standing!

As of now, Engarde is simply a prototype for this concept.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move. Space to Jump. Mouse click to bash in that direction!

CREDITS

Bryan - Programmer, Game Design

Johnny Ngo - Programmer, Physics

Theodore Lee - Programmer, Networking

GOT FEEDBACK?

Let us know on the direction of this game! We'd appreciate any constructive guidance.
